comment.author: 43854658@N00
comment._content: The link captioned, "Find out more about this image", is malformed for this photograph. Several photographs in the James Ring’s West Coast Set have similarly malformed links. As there are more than a half-dozen I have not made individual comments on each.

comment.author: 32741315@N06
comment._content:
Thanks Pixel Wrangler - I'll comb through the set & fix those up now.

-- Courtney
